features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Unified login system supporting both user and admin authentication with JWT tokens, remember me functionality, and role-based access control

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Comprehensive admin panel with user management, test creation, plagiarism monitoring, day settings, and dashboard statistics

features.name: User Management
features.description: Admin functionality to create, update, delete users, manage roles and status, with search and filtering capabilities

features.name: Day-by-Day Learning Path
features.description: Structured 100-day Java learning curriculum with topics, questions, and progressive unlocking system

features.name: Code Practice Interface
features.description: Interactive coding environment with Monaco editor, test case execution, and real-time feedback using Judge0 API

features.name: Test Management System
features.description: Create and manage coding tests with time limits, question selection, and live/scheduled status

features.name: Progress Tracking
features.description: Track user progress through days, questions, and submissions with completion statistics

features.name: Profile Management
features.description: User profile page displaying progress, achievements, and account information with admin redirect

features.name: Question Database
features.description: Repository of Java coding questions with test cases, examples, difficulty levels, and topics

features.name: Dashboard Statistics
features.description: Real-time statistics showing user counts, question metrics, submission data, and system health

features.name: Day Settings Management
features.description: Admin control for locking/unlocking days, managing access, and bulk operations

features.name: Plagiarism Detection
features.description: Monitor and detect potential code plagiarism between user submissions

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Home page with RetroGrid animation, feature showcase, and navigation to login

features.name: Navigation Components
features.description: Separate navigation bars for students and admins with role-based menu items

features.name: API Integration
features.description: Centralized API client with axios interceptors for authentication and error handling

features.name: MongoDB Integration
features.description: Database connection and configuration for MongoDB Atlas

features.name: Code Execution Service
features.description: Integration with Judge0 API for executing and evaluating Java code submissions

features.name: Security Logging
features.description: Track security events and suspicious activities

features.name: Error Boundary
features.description: React error boundary component for graceful error handling

features.name: UI Components Library
features.description: Comprehensive set of reusable UI components from Shadcn UI
